content: /*<![CDATA[*/ $('#title').html($('meta[name=map-description]').attr('content')); /*]]>*/ Tabs and Widgets Widgets are the core components of the Dashboard. Widgets provide specific information about various security-related events. The information that widgets display comes from: Trend Micro Apex Central database Registered managed products Trend Micro Smart Protection Network Tabs provide a container for widgets. The Dashboard supports up to 30 tabs. Related information Working with Tabs Working with Widgets Â© 2025 Trend Micro Incorporated. All rights reserved.Search Knowledge Base
